description:
Cisco says it will not release patches for a cross-site scripting vulnerability impacting end-of-life small business routers.

The post Cisco Warns of Vulnerability in Discontinued Small Business Routers appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Cisco Warns of Vulnerability in Discontinued Small Business Routers

description:
With so much money riding on the promise of AI advances, it’s no surprise that AGI is also becoming a corporate buzzword that sometimes attracts a quasi-religious fervor.

The post Tech Companies Want to Build Artificial General Intelligence. But Who Decides When AGI is Attained? appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Tech Companies Want to Build Artificial General Intelligence. But Who Decides When AGI is Attained?

description:
Noteworthy stories that might have slipped under the radar: the CISA hack could impact 100,000 people, Microsoft AI Copilot banned by US House, UK nuclear site prosecution. 

The post In Other News: 100,000 Affected by CISA Breach, Microsoft AI Copilot Ban, Nuclear Site Prosecution appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: In Other News: 100,000 Affected by CISA Breach, Microsoft AI Copilot Ban, Nuclear Site Prosecution

description:
NIST announced $3.6 million in grants for 18 education and community organizations to build the future cybersecurity workforce.

The post NIST Grants $3.6 Million to Boost US Cybersecurity Workforce appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: NIST Grants $3.6 Million to Boost US Cybersecurity Workforce

description:
Cybersecurity companies raised $2.3 billion in funding in Q1 2024, a 20% decrease compared to the same period of 2023, according to Pinpoint.

The post Cybersecurity Firms Raised $2.3 Billion in Q1 2024: Report appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Cybersecurity Firms Raised $2.3 Billion in Q1 2024: Report

description:
Attackers are exploiting a recent Magento vulnerability to deploy a persistent backdoor on ecommerce websites.

The post Magento Vulnerability Exploited to Deploy Persistent Backdoor appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Magento Vulnerability Exploited to Deploy Persistent Backdoor

description:
Acuity, the tech firm from which hackers claimed to have stolen State Department and other government data, confirms hack, but says stolen info is old.

The post Acuity Responds to US Government Data Theft Claims, Says Hackers Obtained Old Info appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Acuity Responds to US Government Data Theft Claims, Says Hackers Obtained Old Info

description:
Japanese lens maker Hoya says production processes and ordering systems were disrupted by a cyberattack.

The post Lens Maker Hoya Scrambling to Restore Systems Following Cyberattack appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Lens Maker Hoya Scrambling to Restore Systems Following Cyberattack
